item.title: AWS Django Deployment
item.description: Deploying a Django application in VM For development server we can use the built-in Django server. But for production we need to use a web server like Apache or Nginx. In this tutorial we will use Nginx. For safety create a new production branch in git and push it to the server. git branch prod git checkout prod git push origin prod Now we have to install gunicorn then we can call it directly pip install gunicorn Our project have a wsgi.
